verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, holding <S%G2902><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> should blow <S%G4154><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, or <S%G3383><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, or <S%G3383><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> ascend <S%G305><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the sunrising <S%G395><s%>, <S%G2246><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seal <S%G4973><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he cried <S%G2896><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to the four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> it <S%G846><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> to hurt <S%G91><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%>, Hurt <S%G91><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, neither <S%G3383><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, nor <S%G3383><s%> the trees <S%G1186><s%>, till891, 3739 we shall have sealed <S%G4972><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> foreheads <S%G3359><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> that were sealed <S%G4972><s%>, a hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty <S%G5062><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>, sealed <S%G4972><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tribe <S%G5443><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>:

Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Judah <S%G2448><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>: Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Reuben <S%G4502><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Gad <S%G1045><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>;

Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Asher <S%G768><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Naphtali <S%G3508><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Manasseh <S%G3128><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>;

Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Simeon <S%G4826><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Levi <S%G3017><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Issachar <S%G2466><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>;

Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Zebulun <S%G2194><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Joseph <S%G2501><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>; Of <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin <S%G958><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%>.

After <S%G3326><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%>, a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G846><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> number <S%G705><s%>, out of <S%G1537><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of all tribes <S%G5443><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peoples <S%G2992><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%>, standing <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> robes <S%G4749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> palms <S%G5404><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>;

and <S%G2532><s%> they cry <S%G2896><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Salvation <S%G4991><s%> unto our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> sitteth <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto the Lamb <S%G721><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> were standing <S%G2476><s%> round about <S%G2945><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> about the elders <S%G4245><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they fell <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> faces <S%G4383><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worshipped <S%G4352><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

saying <S%G3004><s%>, Amen <S%G281><s%>: Blessing <S%G2129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> might <S%G2479><s%>, be unto our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> answered <S%G611><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> that <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> robes <S%G4749><s%>, who are they <S%G2532><s%>, and whence came <S%G2064><s%> they <S%G4159><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> I say <S%G2046><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, My lord <S%G2962><s%>, thou <S%G4771><s%> knowest <S%G1492><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%>, These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they that come <S%G2064><s%> out <S%G1537><s%> of the great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they washed <S%G4150><s%> their <S%G846><s%> robes <S%G4749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G3021><s%> them <S%G846><s%> white <S%G3021><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb <S%G4749><s%>.

Therefore1223, 5124 are they <S%G1526><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1526><s%> serve <S%G3000><s%> him <S%G846><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> temple <S%G3485><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> shall spread his tabernacle <S%G4637><s%> over them <S%G846><s%>.

They shall hunger <S%G3983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more <S%G2089><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> thirst <S%G1372><s%> any <S%G3361><s%> more <S%G2089><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> shall the sun <S%G2246><s%> strike <S%G4098><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> heat <S%G2738><s%>:

for <S%G3754><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G303><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> shall be their <S%G846><s%> shepherd <S%G4165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall guide <S%G3594><s%> them <S%G846><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters <S%G5204><s%> of life <S%G2198><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall wipe away <S%G1813><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tear <S%G1144><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>.
